Title: Faithless
Actors: Lena Endre, Erland Josephson, Krister Henriksson, Thomas Hanzon
Plot: Marianne is a theatre actress married to an orchestra conductor, Markus. She becomes involved in an affair with their director friend, David, which leads to a painful divorce and battle for custody of their daughter, Isabelle. Although all of them are merely fictional characters created by Bergman, their experiences become very real and traumatic for him.
